Author: avoao
Text: If you can, I think you should tell these people how much they helped you and how grateful you are. I'm sure they sometimes wondered if they were doing the right thing to make you so anxious and afraid, and if you ever need it again they'll be more likely to catch on immediately. I'm so glad you have these wonderful people around you, keep them close. You're totally right, you've come so far already. You should be really proud! Hang in there, keep fighting!
